sessionSecurity.maxSessionsHelp: Oldest sessions will be terminated when limit is reached
sessionSecurity.requireReauthHelp: Force users to log in again after session idle timeout

ipAllowlist.warning: Be careful when enabling IP restrictions. Make sure to include your current IP address to avoid locking yourself out.
ipAllowlist.addIpHelp: Supports exact IP addresses and wildcard patterns (e.g., 192.168.1.*)

dataExport.title: Data Export
dataExport.subtitle: Download a copy of your personal data
dataExport.gdprNotice: Under GDPR Article 20, you have the right to receive a copy of your personal data in a structured, commonly used, and machine-readable format. Export requests are typically processed within 30 days.
dataExport.requestDescription: Request a complete export of all your data stored in Castiel. This includes your profile information, shards, audit logs, and all associated metadata.
dataExport.includeShards: All shards and shard types you've created
dataExport.historyDescription: Your previous data export requests and their current status
dataExport.noExports: No export requests yet. Click the button above to request your first data export.
dataExport.processingTimeDesc: Data exports are typically processed within a few minutes for small datasets. Larger exports may take up to 24 hours.
dataExport.downloadAvailabilityDesc: Completed exports are available for download for 30 days. After this period, the file will be automatically deleted for security reasons.
dataExport.dataFormatDesc: Exports are provided in JSON format, which is structured, commonly used, and machine-readable. This format can be easily imported into other systems or analyzed using standard tools.
dataExport.securityDesc: Export files are encrypted and access is limited to your account. Download links expire after use or after 7 days, whichever comes first.
